locations: La Défense Grande Arche, Parvis de la Défense, 92800 Puteaux, France
Parc de la Villette, 211 Avenue Jean Jaurès, 75019 Paris, France
imdb.plot outline: Kidnapped for two months, Julie Bélanger remains untraceable. This 17-year-old woman is the daughter of Daniel Bélanger. Being a famous finance magnate, he is also suspected of financing the drug trade of Giovani Risko, an illustrious drug trafficker that rages between Paris and Italy. Nolane, a 40-year-old cop and B.P. R (Police and research Brigade) are in charge of this thorny investigation. But today, it is a turning point for them: they are about to apprehend the dangerous Karim Hamida alias "HK ".
imdb.title: Nolane
plot: Kidnapped for two months, Julie Bélanger remains untraceable. This 17-year-old woman is the daughter of Daniel Bélanger. Being a famous finance magnate, he is also suspected of financing the drug trade of Giovani Risko, an illustrious drug trafficker that rages between Paris and Italy. _Nolane_ (qv), a 40-year-old cop and B.P. R (Police and research Brigade) are in charge of this thorny investigation. But today, it is a turning point for them: they are about to apprehend the dangerous Karim Hamida alias "HK ".::Shanelle NICOSIA
